snippet.title: Little Ghosthunter | Demo Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Uncover the stories behind a family of ghosts to free them from the confines of their own house, as you search for a way to summon your best friend from the afterlife.
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2384680/Little_Ghosthunter/?beta=0
